    • Constructor Detail

      • AccelerometerInput

        public AccelerometerInput(Context context,
                  int sensorRate)
        Return a new instance of AccelerometerInput.
        Parameters:
        context - Context Android
        sensorRate - Sample rate value for the sensor. The value must be one of android.hardware.Sensor.SENSOR_DELAY_NORMAL, android.hardware.Sensor.SENSOR_DELAY_UI, android.hardware.Sensor.SENSOR_DELAY_GAME, or android.hardware.Sensor.SENSOR_DELAY_FASTEST or, the desired delay between events in microsecond.
